error.msg: Obsolete function 'gets' called. It is recommended to use 'fgets' or 'gets_s' instead.
error.verbose: The obsolete function 'gets' is called. With 'gets' you'll get a buffer overrun if the input data exceeds the size of the buffer. It is recommended to use the functions 'fgets' or 'gets_s' instead.

error.msg: Array 'buf[10]' accessed at index 10, which is out of bounds.
error.verbose: Array 'buf[10]' accessed at index 10, which is out of bounds.
